metadata.title: DEPRECATED: Evaluate to true if the evr_string datatype is properly supported
metadata.description: This definition is intended to evalutate to true if the interpreter properly supports the evr_string datatype and all of its valid operations.

modified.comment: Deprecating in favor of new OVAL Test Content

criteria.comment: True if the equals operation is supported

criterion.comment: Check of the equals operation with a single equal evr_string.
Check of the equals operation with a single unequal evr_string.

criteria.comment: True if the not equal operation is supported

criterion.comment: Check of the not equal operation with a single equal evr_string.
Check of the not equal operation with a single unequal evr_string.

criteria.comment: True if the greater than operation is supported

criterion.comment: Check of the greater than operation with a single greater than evr_string.
Check of the greater than operation with a single equal evr_string.
Check of the greater than operation with a single less than evr_string.

criteria.comment: True if the greater than or equal operation is supported

criterion.comment: Check of the greater than or equal operation with a single greater than evr_string.
Check of the greater than or equal operation with a single equal evr_string.
Check of the greater than or equal operation with a single less than evr_string.

criteria.comment: True if the less than operation is supported

criterion.comment: Check of the less than operation with a single less than evr_string.
Check of the less than operation with a single equal evr_string.
Check of the less than operation with a single greater than evr_string.

criteria.comment: True if the less than or equal operation is supported

criterion.comment: Check of the less than or equal operation with a single less than evr_string.
Check of the less than or equal operation with a single equal evr_string.
Check of the less than or equal operation with a single greater than evr_string.
